review_text: Just back from another stay at Sumilon Island, Bluewater. I have been to beach resorts all over the Philippines and the world; this remains one of my favorites. …

Sumilon Island was the second marine sanctuary to be setup in the Philippines.
Sumilon Island is a pristine paradise boasting pristine beaches, crystal-clear waters, and a stunning sandbar, providing an idyllic retreat for those seeking serenity and natural beauty.

Amazing views everywhere on the island. Rooms were really clean , spacious and all ocean view. The bathroom was gigantic, modern with natural lighting from the huge sky lights. Wifi and A/C was flawless. The main restaurant serving breakfast and dinner had great ambiance. Highly recommended!!!

This is a must see when in Cebu. Bring drinks and snack. Also sun protection since no shade in the swimming area.

Beautiful island, cost about 1000 peso for 2 pax return ticket. if you happen to go for whale watching, dont go back to your hostel/hotel first! head to this island and then head back to the city. Nothing much to do here, but its a not bad place to just chill..
